question: Which country is to organize the 2019 NATO Summit?
explanation: The NATO 2019 summit will take place in Watford, UK. Some of the world\'s most important leaders will meet at The Grove Hotel at Chandler\'s Cross. NATO summits are a periodic opportunity for Heads of State and Heads of Government to meet and evaluate NATO\'s current strategies, evaluate the alliance\'s current position and brainstorm strategic direction.
